daily_summary.headline: Exciting Space Events on the Horizon

top_events.title: G1 Geomagnetic Storm Potential
top_events.description: A G1 geomagnetic storm is predicted on January 28, offering a chance for aurora sightings at high latitudes.
top_events.action: Check aurora forecasts and plan for potential sightings at high latitudes.

top_events.title: Falcon 9 Block 5 Launch
top_events.description: SpaceX's Falcon 9 Block 5 is set to launch the GPS III SV09 satellite, enhancing global navigation systems.
top_events.action: Watch the live stream of the launch for real-time updates.

top_events.title: Electron Rocket Launch
top_events.description: Rocket Lab's Electron rocket will launch the NeonSat-1A, contributing to Earth observation capabilities.
top_events.action: Follow the launch updates and watch the live stream.

opportunities.recommendation: Possible aurora at high latitudes. Best for northern locations (65°+). Worth checking if conditions are optimal.
Possible aurora at high latitudes. Best for northern locations (65°+). Worth checking if conditions are optimal.
